abstracts.cdata!:
With regard to the Private Sector
            Competitiveness Development Policy Loan (DPL), Executive
            Directors approved this DPL to the Republic of Mauritius in
            an amount of GBP 9.6 million (US$ 15 million equivalent) on
            the payment terms and conditions set out in the
            President's Memorandum. Directors commended the
            Authorities for the sound macroeconomic management that
            provided the country with the resilience at the onset of the
            global economic crisis. They further noted that reforms were
            necessary for Mauritius to maintain its growth potential.
            Directors also commented on the role of International
            Finance Corporation (IFC) in support to the Development Bank
            of Mauritius. Executive Directors emphasized the importance
            of addressing the challenge of economic and external risks
            to the operation and encouraged the continued collaboration
            with other development partners.
